alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Jackson; Meigs; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 9:48AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Meigs, north central Gallia, Jackson and southeastern Vinton Counties through 1015 AM EST... At 947 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Piketon, or 9 miles west of Jackson, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Wellston, Hamden, Coalton, Wilkesville, Petersburg, Salem Center and Radcliffe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
